content: General Investments Asked by Sevilla CheaAsked on 27 Oct 2018I'm looking to start investing in REITs. Is FSMOne a suitable platform? ?I don't suppose FSMOne will collapse alongside my investments? it has half the commission fees the other CDP-linked brokerages are charging so it's quite attractive to me.1 answerAnswerBump1

Hariz Arthur Maloy, Independent Financial Advisor at Promiseland IndependentTop Contributor (Sep)Level 9. God of WisdomAnswered on 28 Oct 2018FSM is a great platform. I don't any hold any stocks or REITS myself, but for funds, they're one of favourite user friendly platforms.0 comments1
